short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create P2P trades for CS7.market users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CS7.market is a marketplace for safe and quick sales of skins using the p2p system (player to player). This extension is designed for secure trading and trade confirmation.

Extention automatically create a trade after purchasing your skins. You just have to confirm it on your phone

Please do not delete or change the Steam api key in order to avoid any errors.
